# sliceIndex

**Instance Property**

The index of the view’s texture in an array-based texture type.

## Declaration

```swift
var sliceIndex: Int { get }
```

## Discussion

Use the returned index to retrieve the view’s texture when the texture type is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Metal/MTLTextureType/type2DArray]. When configuring your render pass descriptor, specify the index in the [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Metal/MTLRenderPassAttachmentDescriptor/slice] property of the descriptor’s color and depth attachments.

If you don’t use array-based textures for drawing, fetch the index using [doc://com.apple.compositorservices/documentation/CompositorServices/LayerRenderer/Drawable/View/TextureMap-swift.struct/textureIndex] instead.

## Getting the view’s texture map

- **textureMap**: The texture map for a view.
- **textureIndex**: The index of the view’s textures in the drawable.
- **viewport**: The portion of the texture that the view uses to draw its content.
